I've deleted inaccurate information and added back accurate information.
I edited an inaccurate information about sex outside of marriage being illegal in the country

/* Related penal code concerns */Removed an article with not much relevance to the topic and that also wasn't translated as it is in its entirety; the article actually include a number of details which make it seem to be indicative of different meanings than the one removed.
/* Related penal code concerns */Deleted information with not much relevance to the topic.

I added information to clarify things about a certain term. I removed incorrect information and added the term "fojoor" in certain articles as written in the actual law. It is inaccurate to translate the term to "immorality" because in reality the term is used for specific situations only, and the translation gives the impression of the term legally covering more than it actually does.
Clarified a procedure from the criminal procedure code.
I put down information regarding the legality of sex outside of marriage in the country. I also added and rearranged information regarding the law and non-consensual sex in the country.
Fixed grammatical error in the article 324 section and removed and added information in the article 328 section to make it more similar to how the article is actually written in the penal code.
I added clarification on certain information and citation for the addition.

The specific article in the penal code includes the term "fojoor", which lacks an explicit legal definition. Also, the article being used to crack down on gay and bisexual men lacks proof and is not found in the citation provided.
/* Bahrain */Removed inaccurate information which also could not be traced within any citation provided in the section.
I removed inaccurate information about the law which also could not be found within any citation provided in the section.
I deleted certain information due to the mention of a legal article which could cause confusion
I added detail which should clarify how a certain procedure works.

I removed a sourced content and replaced it with another. The previous content included an outdated link of the Bahrain penal code. I edited information from the updated penal code, specified an article from the code, and provided a link for it as well.
/* Bahrain */Fixed an inaccurate information, which could easily be checked through the citation provided by the editor.
/* Bahrain */I deleted an inaccurate information which lacks a source.
/* About age of consent in Asia */ new section
/* Related penal code concerns */Deleted information which needed much further details.
/* Related penal code concerns */Deleted an article which is in fact (within the Bahraini penal code) much long and indicates certain meanings unlike the information put by the editor.
/* Bahrain */I deleted a link which included translations for laws that could be easily misunderstood to mean what the laws do not actually mean.
/* Bahrain */Adder an accurate legal information.
/* Bahrain */I fixed a misinformation about sex outside of marriage being illegal in Bahrain.

/* Related penal code concerns */Fixed a misinformation regarding article 350. The law requires the non-consent of the woman regarding certain behaviours for it to be applied. The person who edited the information had a clear misunderstanding of the article.
I fixed the misinformation about sex outside of marriage being illegal in Bahrain and cited the Bahraini penal code.
I corrected a misinformation; sex outside of marriage is not criminalized in Bahrain.
Again, the previous editor either has a misunderstanding of what "fojoor فجور" means under the law or deliberately fails to mentions the lacks of an explicit legal definition for the term.

I deleted information put by the editor, who failed to mention that in place of what they put as "immorality" is a term which lacks an explicit legal definiton, "Fojoor فجور" This term  seems to be applied only to certain acts. The editor gave a translation to the term which could be misleading and indicative of it concering way more than it does.
I deleted an information which lacked a source.

I corrected information about article 329. The previous edit did not only fail to mention the lack of an explicit legal definiton for a certain term, but added information that was absent from the article by the end; one that could cause much confusion as it indicates  that private consensual sex between adults is illegal.
I corrected information about article 324. There is no explicit legal definition for a certain term in the article.
I dded accurate legal information and provided a source for the updated penal code
